Class PlayerBattle

java.lang.Object
CharacterBattle
PlayerBattle
public class PlayerBattle
extends CharacterBattle
An extension of the CharacterBattle class, this class is exclusive to the player as only the player is capable of earning exp and leveling up.

      public void gainedEXP​(int newEXP)
      Every time the player defeats an enemy they earn exp and with enough exp they become more powerful with increased health and attack
      Parameters:
      newEXP - The EXP earned from the enemy to be given to the player
